channel.title: Comments on: Improve Tennis Skills With These Top 10 Tennis Training Devices
channel.description: Your secret weapon on the court.

item.title: By: Bekky
item.dc:creator: Bekky
item.description:
Hi there,
Thanks so much for this helpful information. Would you recommend against using any of this equipment by a 7 year old?
Thanks!
item.content:encoded:
